SELECT ue.*,pb.ProductName,pi.ImageSite,pp.ProductPrice from userEvaluation ue LEFT JOIN ProductBasis pb ON ue.productId=pb.ProductId LEFT JOIN ProductImage pi ON ue.productId=pi.ProductId LEFT JOIN ProductPrice pp ON ue.productId=pp.ProductId WHERE ue.userId = #{userId} AND pi.sign=1 order by evaluationTime desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM userEvaluation WHERE userId=#{userId}
